com.github.valid8j.pcond.validator

Interface MessageComposer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageComposer.Default

    public interface MessageComposer

    An interface that defines methods to compose a message when a value violates a given condition based on a context.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MessageComposer.Default
      A default implementation of MessageComposer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> String composeMessageForAssertion(T value, Predicate<? super T> predicate)
      Compose a message string for a value, which violates a general condition given as predicate.
      <T> String composeMessageForPostcondition(T value, Predicate<? super T> predicate)
      Compose a message string for a value, which violates a postcondition given as predicate.
      <T> String composeMessageForPrecondition(T value, Predicate<? super T> predicate)
      Compose a message string for a value, which violates a precondition given as predicate.
      <T> String composeMessageForValidation(T value, Predicate<? super T> predicate)
      Compose a message string for a value, which violates a user input checking condition given as predicate.

    • Method Detail

      • composeMessageForPrecondition

        <T> String composeMessageForPrecondition(T value,
                                         Predicate<? super T> predicate)

        Compose a message string for a value, which violates a precondition given as predicate.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value.
        Parameters:
        value - A value for which a message is created.
        predicate - A condition that a given value violated.
        Returns:
        A composed message string.

      • composeMessageForPostcondition

        <T> String composeMessageForPostcondition(T value,
                                          Predicate<? super T> predicate)

        Compose a message string for a value, which violates a postcondition given as predicate.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value.
        Parameters:
        value - A value for which a message is created.
        predicate - A condition that a given value violated.
        Returns:
        A composed message string.

      • composeMessageForAssertion

        <T> String composeMessageForAssertion(T value,
                                      Predicate<? super T> predicate)

        Compose a message string for a value, which violates a general condition given as predicate. Used for invariant conditions, test assertion (assertThat), and test prerequisition checking (assumeThat).

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value.
        Parameters:
        value - A value for which a message is created.
        predicate - A condition that a given value violated.
        Returns:
        A composed message string.

      • composeMessageForValidation

        <T> String composeMessageForValidation(T value,
                                       Predicate<? super T> predicate)

        Compose a message string for a value, which violates a user input checking condition given as predicate.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value.
        Parameters:
        value - A value for which a message is created.
        predicate - A condition that a given value violated.
        Returns:
        A composed message string.
